Trade/Device Name(s): HemoCue HbA1c 501 Glycosylated Hemoglobin Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Infopia's HemoCue HbA1c 501 system modifications for usability improvements and additional device functions
Indications for Use Summary: Intended use for monitoring glycosylated hemoglobin remains unchanged from the predicate device
